title: Organizational Development Competency Enhancement: Collaborative-Blended Learning-Based Smartphone Website Design Training

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can build smartphone-friendly website prototypes applying responsive web design principles
Learners can explain user-centered design processes with over 80% accuracy through collaborative learning activities
Evaluate accessibility standards in mobile environments and apply at least three accessibility improvements to a website

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
